payload.title: Implement cycle remove-task and move-task commands
payload.description:
# Implement cycle remove-task and move-task commands

## OBJECTIVE
Implement missing cycle management commands based on real reorganization experience.

## CURRENT STATE
- ✅ gitgov cycle add-task - EXISTS
- ❌ gitgov cycle remove-task - MISSING  
- ❌ gitgov cycle move-task - MISSING

## COMMANDS TO IMPLEMENT

### 1. Remove Task from Cycle
gitgov cycle remove-task <cycleId> --task <taskId>

### 2. Move Task Between Cycles  
gitgov cycle move-task <targetCycleId> --task <taskId> --from <sourceCycleId>

## USE CASES
- Weekly planning reorganization (our real scenario)
- Clean up duplicated tasks
- Batch operations with multiple tasks

## IMPLEMENTATION
- Backend: Extend BacklogAdapter
- CLI: Add subcommands to cycle command
- Support batch processing
- Maintain bidirectional consistency
